com.tngtech.infrastructure.util.io
Interface FileContentProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
CachingFileContentProvider, DefaultFileContentProvider
public interface FileContentProvider

Get the content of files.

Method Summary

          Get the file content for a given file.
 java.lang.String getFileContent(java.io.File f, java.lang.String encoding)
          Get the file content for a given file as string.

Method Detail

getFileContent

byte[] getFileContent(java.io.File f)
Get the file content for a given file.

Parameters:
f - the file to get the content for
Returns:
a byte array containing the file content

getFileContent

java.lang.String getFileContent(java.io.File f,
                                java.lang.String encoding)
Get the file content for a given file as string.

Parameters:
f - the file to get the content for
encoding - the encoding to expect
Returns:
the file content as string

removeFromCache

void removeFromCache(java.io.File f,
                     java.lang.String encoding)
If the implementation does some sort of caching, update the cache for the given file

Parameters:
f - the file to update the cache for
encoding - the encoding of the file (may be null if only getFileContent(File f) was called before)
